response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is a unique chance to secure an exceptional asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 10000}
